```{r}
#| echo: false
today_date <- Sys.Date()

days <- as.numeric(today_date - as.Date("1jan2025", "%d%b%Y"))
msg <- cat("Today is ", format(today_date, "%B %-d, %Y"), ". It has been ", days, " days since January 1, 2025.", sep = "")

msg <- cat("Run DateTime: ", format(Sys.time()))
```
